item.title: Galley Waste Receptacle Access Doors/ Covers

numlitem.para: Receptacle access is secured to prevent waste introduction into the receptacle, and
Procedures are established to ensure that sufficient galley waste receptacles are available to accommodate all waste that may be generated on a flight.
Prior to blockout ensure an adequate number of garbage bags are onboard.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to the waste access door "DO NO USE" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
